description:
Looking to hit the lookout by lunch? Osprey’s suspended mesh AirSpeed™ back panel lets cool air circulate as you pick up the pace on your day hike or light overnight. Bonus: the UNLTD™ Antigravity is hydration-compatible and even has loops for your trekking poles and ice axe. Plenty of pockets stash everything you need in the right spot and the integrated rain cover keeps your kit dry when the clouds open up.

  • Made of lightweight NanoFly™ 210-denier high-tenacity weaved nylon with a DWR finish for weather protection
  • AirSpeed™ AntiGravity breathable mesh suspension allows air to flow freely between the pack and your back
  • Large zip access to main compartment and easy-access upper zip pocket with key clip
  • Dual upper and lower quick release compression straps
  • Easy-access upper zip pocket with key clip keeps phone, wallet and other valuables handy
  • Front zip pocket with laminated zip flap stores maps and other essentials
  • Adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle
  • EVA foam padded hipbelt with large, zippered pockets provide secure access to small essentials on the trail
  • Stow-on-the-Go trekking pole attachments let you stash your poles without removing the pack
  • Ice tool loop with bungee tie-off
  • Dedicated external access hydration compartment with Osprey Hydraclip for easier reservoir hanging
  • Custom-sized rain cover stows in its own dedicated pocket, so you're always prepared for bad weather
name: Osprey UNLTD AntiGravity 32 Daypack - Men's
